TextBlock.Text: XML yozing, WPF dastur oling. Compile qilish, kutish yo'q.
To'liq XAML qo'llab-quvvatlash, animatsiyalar va effektlar.
Kerak bo'lsa C# kodni to'g'ridan-to'g'ri yozing.

TextBox.Text: <NimbusApp Name="Hello" Width="400" Height="300"> <UI> <StackPanel Background="#1E1E1E"> <TextBlock Text="Salom Dunyo!" FontSize="32" Foreground="White"/> <Button Name="btn" Content="Bos!" onClick="SayHello"/> </StackPanel> </UI> <Logic> <Handler Name="SayHello"> <Alert Message="Salom!"/> </Handler> </Logic> </NimbusApp>

:: build.bat ni ishga tushiring build.bat
:: Yoki qo'lda: csc /target:winexe /out:Nimbus.exe ^ /r:PresentationCore.dll ^ /r:PresentationFramework.dll ^ /r:WindowsBase.dll ^ src\*.cs

TextBlock.Text: Har bir Nimbus dasturi quyidagi strukturaga ega:

TextBox.Text: <NimbusApp Name="..." Width="..." Height="..."> <UI> <!-- UI elementlar --> </UI> <Logic> <!-- Event handler'lar --> </Logic> <Shortcuts> <!-- Klaviatura shortcut'lar --> </Shortcuts> <ManualC> <!-- C# kodi --> </ManualC> </NimbusApp>

<Grid Background="#1E1E1E"> <Grid.RowDefinitions>Auto, *, Auto</Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions>200, *, 200</Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<TextBlock Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" Text="Header"/> <TextBlock Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1" Text="Content"/> </Grid>

<Handler Name="SendMessage"> <AddItem Container="messagesPanel" Type="ChatBubble" Text="{messageInput.Text}" Sender="me" Animate="true"/> <Set Control="messageInput" Property="Text" Value=""/> </Handler>
<Animate Control="myControl" Property="Opacity" From="0" To="1" Duration="300" Easing="QuadraticEase"/>

Grid.Grid.RowDefinitions: Auto, Auto, Auto, Auto, Auto, Auto, Auto

TextBlock.Text: ManualC runtime'da compile bo'ladi. Xatolar bo'lsa, dastur ishga tushganda ko'rsatiladi.

TextBox.Text:
<ManualC id="myFunction" method="Calculate">
<![CDATA[
using System.Windows;

public static void Calculate()
{
    // WPF API'ga to'liq kirish
    MessageBox.Show("ManualC ishlayapti!");
    
    // Control'larga kirish
    var window = Application.Current.MainWindow;
    
    // Animatsiya yaratish
    var animation = new DoubleAnimation(0, 1, 
        TimeSpan.FromSeconds(0.5));
}
]]>
</ManualC>

<Shortcuts> <KeyBinding Key="F12" Handler="ToggleDarkMode"/> <KeyBinding Key="Escape" Handler="GoBack"/> <KeyBinding Key="S" Modifiers="Control" Handler="Save"/> <KeyBinding Key="N" Modifiers="Control,Shift" Handler="NewFile"/> </Shortcuts>
<If Condition="display.Text == 0"> <Then> <Set Control="display" Property="Text" Value="1"/> </Then> <Else> <AppendText Control="display" Text="1"/> </Else> </If>
